document.full_text: u.s. first lady michelle obama will write a book about the kitchen garden she started at the white house and her efforts to promote healthy eating, the crown publishing group said on wednesday.
document.title: michelle obama to write book about white house garden
lines_and_colors: u.s. first lady michelle obama will write a book about the kitchen garden she started at the white house and her efforts to promote healthy eating, the crown publishing group said on wednesday.
